posts.cooked_content: Can anyone forward the specified links of the books(iitm certified(logo)) or pdf’s for preparation?
posts.cleaned_text: Can anyone forward the specified links of the books(iitm certified(logo)) or pdf’s for preparation?

posts.cooked_content:
@Divya1 there are no IITM certified books nor PDFs for Tools in Data Science. The site https://tds.s-anand.net/ is the reference.

We update the content regularly. You might want to track the changes for recent updates.
